welcome.about_komputerclub: komputer.club is a webring and community for those who cherish the early web aesthetic. We're bringing back the magic of personal homepages, animated GIFs, and the DIY spirit that made the internet fun.
welcome.why_komputerclub1: The internet has become a desolate, corporate wasteland. We want to make it personal and fun again.
welcome.why_komputerclub2: We exist to bring people together, with websites made by people - not social media sites that want to prey on you and your personal data.

join.webring_explanation: A webring is a collection of websites that are linked together in a circular fashion. Webrings and link lists were the primary way to discover new websites in the early days of the internet, since search engines were generally low quality. They are a great way to find new and interesting content, and to connect with like-minded people.
join.join_komputerclub_explanation: Register in the form below, and add the HTML on your site. We have an automated process to check if the HTML is present on your site, and if it is, you will be added to the webring.
join.code_of_conduct_tldr: TLDR - Our webring community commits to:
join.conduct_inclusive: Creating an inclusive, harassment-free environment where we respect diverse perspectives and resolve conflicts through dialogue
join.conduct_responsibility: Taking responsibility for our actions and accepting feedback with grace
join.conduct_wellbeing: Contributing to collective wellbeing through collaborative rather than competitive approaches
join.conduct_preserve: Collectively preserving and enhancing the open, free internet
